article: One can have many experiences, but the one I never forget is my bicycling trip in Taiwan. When we were going to  _  school, my teacher suggested that we could do something special to remember our school life. After a long discussion, we decided to travel  _  the whole island by bicycle. We began to get some training to make our  _  stronger. So we ran 3,000 meters after school. At first, I could only ran about 2,000 meters. My legs were heavy like steel and my heart  _  very fast. After two weeks of training, I could run 3,000 meters  _  . We started our journey the last week of July. We rode about 100 kilometers  every day  . It was very hot and our clothes were  _  all the time. One day, we were riding up the mountain when there were  _  wrong with my bicycle, and I fell and was hurt. I almost gave up and didn't want to  _  the trip, but I tried to solve the problems successfully and kept on. Fifteen days passed, we returned to school again. We were so  _  . This experience was like a miracle for me. I learned that I could do what I want to.
